# Quotes
Type different type of quotes from many languages using [espanso](https://espanso.org). It replaces keywords like `:'[` with `ã€Œ`. Keep reading for more details.

## Installation
Install the package with
```sh
espanso install quotes
```

## Usage
This package replaces the listed keywords with listed quotes while typing.


| Shortcut | Character | Description
|-|-|-
| ``` :--- ``` | â€• | horizontal bar
| ``` :--. ``` | â€” | em dash
| ``` :-. ``` | â€“ | en dash
| ``` :"< ``` | Â« | left-pointing double angle quotation mark
| ``` :"> ``` | Â» | right-pointing double angle quotation mark
| ``` :'' ``` | â€˜ | left single quotation mark
| ``` :', ``` | â€™ | right single quotation mark
| ``` :'_, ``` | â€š | single low-9 quotation mark
| ``` :'` ``` | â€› | single high-reversed-9 quotation mark
| ``` :"' ``` | â€œ | left double quotation mark
| ``` :", ``` | â€ | right double quotation mark
| ``` :"_, ``` | â€ | double low-9 quotation mark
| ``` :"` ``` | â€Ÿ | double high-reversed-9 quotation mark
| ``` :'< ``` | â€¹ | single left-pointing angle quotation mark
| ``` :'> ``` | â€º | single right-pointing angle quotation mark
| ``` :"_` ``` | â¹‚ | double low-reversed-9 quotation mark
| ``` :^[ ``` | âŒœ | top left corner
| ``` :^] ``` | âŒ | top right corner
| ``` :'*' ``` | â› | heavy single turned comma quotation mark ornament
| ``` :'*, ``` | âœ | heavy single comma quotation mark ornament
| ``` :"*' ``` | â | heavy double turned comma quotation mark ornament
| ``` :", ``` | â | heavy double comma quotation mark ornament
| ``` :"!' ``` | ğŸ™¶ | sans-serif heavy double turned comma quotation mark ornament
| ``` :"!, ``` | ğŸ™· | sans-serif heavy double comma quotation mark ornament
| ``` :"!_, ``` | ğŸ™¸ | sans-serif heavy low double comma quotation mark ornament
| ``` :.: ``` | â ´ | braille pattern dots-236
| ``` ::. ``` | â ¦ | braille pattern dots-356
| ``` :'[ ``` | ã€Œ | left corner bracket
| ``` :'] ``` | ã€ | right corner bracket
| ``` :"[ ``` | ã€ | left white corner bracket
| ``` :"] ``` | ã€ | right white corner bracket
| ``` :`` ``` | ã€ | reversed double prime quotation mark
| ``` :`, ``` | ã€ | double prime quotation mark
| ``` :`_` ``` | ã€Ÿ | low double prime quotation mark
| ``` :'^[ ``` | ï¹ | presentation form for vertical left corner bracket
| ``` :'^] ``` | ï¹‚ | presentation form for vertical right corner bracke
| ``` :"^[ ``` | ï¹ƒ | presentation form for vertical left white corner bracket
| ``` :"^] ``` | ï¹„ | presentation form for vertical right white corner bracket
| ``` :"" ``` | ï¼‚ | fullwidth quotation mark
| ``` :'" ``` | ï¼‡ | fullwidth apostrophe
| ``` :'_[ ``` | ï½¢ | halfwidth left corner bracket
| ``` :'_] ``` | ï½£  | halfwidth right corner bracket
| ``` :"+< ``` | ã€Š | left double angle brackets korean
| ``` :"+> ``` | ã€‹ | right double angle brackets korean
| ``` :'+< ``` | ã€ˆ | left single angle brackets korean
| ``` :'+> ``` | ã€‰ | right single angle brackets korean
